summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new seller functionality. Backend APIs 100% functional (39/39 tests passed including new PUT/DELETE endpoints). Frontend seller dashboard working with proper stats display, add product functionality, and authorization controls.

integration_issues.issue: User sessions expire quickly requiring frequent re-login during automated testing
integration_issues.details: This appears to be a testing environment issue rather than a functional bug. Core functionality works correctly.

passed_tests: Authorization checks - sellers can only edit/delete own products
Authorization checks - buyers cannot create/edit/delete products
Dashboard stats display (products: 14, sales: 330, revenue: $31896.70, views: 3307)
Add product button opens dialog with complete form
Add product form validation and submission
Product creation success (verified by stats increment)
Products table displays with all columns (image, title, type, price, stock, sales, views, actions)
Profile page shows 'Manage Products' button for sellers only
Buyer access restriction - redirected from seller dashboard
Seller profile 'Manage Products' button redirects to dashboard
All existing marketplace functionality remains intact
